languages.text: "Прекрати свои игры, ксенос. Вольный Торговец не так{mf|ой|ая}, как ты. И никогда не будет".
languages.translation_comment: RT has an active romance with both Marazhai and Solomorne.

traits.locale_text: "Прекрати свои игры, ксенос. Вольный Торговец не так{mf|ой|ая}, как ты. И никогда не будет".

languages.text: "Desist from your games, xenos. The Rogue Trader is nothing like you. And {mf|he|she} will never be."
languages.translation_comment: RT has an active romance with both Marazhai and Solomorne.
languages.original_text: "Прекрати свои игры, ксенос. Вольный Торговец не так{mf|ой|ая}, как ты. И никогда не будет".

traits.locale_text: "Desist from your games, xenos. The Rogue Trader is nothing like you. And {mf|he|she} never will be."
"Desist from your games, xenos. The Rogue Trader is nothing like you. And {mf|he|she} never will be."
"Desist from your games, xenos. The Rogue Trader is nothing like you. And {mf|he|she} never will be."

"Desist from your games, xenos. The Rogue Trader is nothing like you. And {mf|he|she} will never be."

languages.text: 「ふざけるのはやめろ、異種族め。ローグトレーダーはお前とは違う。これからも決してお前のようにはならない」
languages.original_text: "Desist from your games, xenos. The Rogue Trader is nothing like you. And {mf|he|she} will never be."

traits.locale_text: 「ふざけるのはやめろ、異種族め。ローグトレーダーはお前とは違う。これからも決してお前のようにはならない」

languages.text: "Schluss mit Euren Spielchen, Xenos. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ist nicht wie Ihr. Und das wird {mf|er|sie} auch niemals sein."
languages.original_text: "Desist from your games, xenos. The Rogue Trader is nothing like you. And {mf|he|she} will never be."

traits.locale_text: "Schluss mit Euren Spielchen, Xenos. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ist nicht wie Ihr. Und das wird {mf|er|sie} auch niemals sein."

languages.text: « Cessez vos jeux sordides, xénos. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} n'est pas comme vous et cela ne changera jamais. »
languages.original_text: "Desist from your games, xenos. The Rogue Trader is nothing like you. And {mf|he|she} will never be."

traits.locale_text: « Cessez vos jeux sordides, xénos. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} n'est pas comme vous et cela ne changera jamais. »

languages.text: «Desista de sus juegos, xenos. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente no se parece en nada a usted. Y nunca lo hará».
languages.original_text: "Desist from your games, xenos. The Rogue Trader is nothing like you. And {mf|he|she} will never be."

traits.locale_text: «Desista de sus juegos, xenos. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente no se parece en nada a usted. Y nunca lo hará».

languages.text: “你这场游戏该结束了，异形。行商浪人和你不是一路人，{mf|他|她}也永远都不会和你成为一路人。”
languages.original_text: "Desist from your games, xenos. The Rogue Trader is nothing like you. And {mf|he|she} will never be."

traits.locale_text: “你这场游戏该结束了，异形。行商浪人和你不是一路人，{mf|他|她}也永远都不会和你成为一路人。”

languages.text: "Oyun oynamayı bırak zeno. Hür Tacir senin gibi değil, asla olmayacak da."
languages.original_text: "Desist from your games, xenos. The Rogue Trader is nothing like you. And {mf|he|she} will never be."
